title: OpenAI, Tata To Build Data Centre Infrastructure In India
summary_full: US ChatGPT maker OpenAI and IT giant Tata Consultancy Services announced a plan to build data centre infrastructure in the South Asian country currently hosting a major artificial intelligence summit.
summary_public: US ChatGPT maker OpenAI and IT giant Tata Consultancy Services announced a plan to build data centre infrastructure in the South Asian country currently hosting a major artificial intelligence summit.
